Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ChatHistory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ModelObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ChatHistory
public class ChatHistory extends ModelObservable
The ChatHistory class represents the history of the messages sent through the chat

  • Method Details

    • addNewMessage

      public void addNewMessage(ChatMessage message)
      adds a message to the chatMessageList as a ChatMessage object. Additionally, the designated chat (private or public) is notified depending on the isPublic attribute of the message
      Parameters:
      message - specifies the messages that needs to be added
